database.name: Query Sample
database.query: SELECT Customers.CustomerID, CompanyName, SUM(UnitPrice * Quantity) AS Spending FROM (Customers INNER JOIN Orders ON Customers.CustomerID = Orders.CustomerID) INNER JOIN [Order Details] ON Orders.OrderID = [Order Details].OrderID GROUP BY Customers.CustomerID, CompanyName ORDER BY SUM(UnitPrice * Quantity) DESC
